title: 40. Jan Marini + The Acne Epidemic: Achieving Total Clearing, Scars Vs. PIH, Accutane Is Not a Cure, and Debunking "Medical Grade."
description:
Hi Roomies,

Welcome to another episode of #BehindTheBrand where I'm chatting with experts at top clinical skincare lines to understand the products, the technology behind them, and help esties understand what's on the market and why it works!

In this episode I'm talking to Jan Marini, founder of Jan Marini Skin Research. JMSR is a recognized leader and innovator in skin care that is committed to continually expanding and improving the professional skin care market. 

This episode covers:

  • "Medical Grade"
  • What differentiates clinical products from ineffective over the counter products
  • The acne epidemic
  • How acne starts
  • The acne solution
  • Spot treating
  • Scars vs PIH
  • Hormonal acne
  • Diet and lifestyle factors that affect acne

Follow Jan Marini on Instagram

Connect with Jan Marini on Facebook

Learn more about Jan Marini products

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical
